hobbii 51% wool 49% acrylic 100 g / 3 5 oz = 350 m / 382 yds **gauge** 16 double_crochet sts x 11 row first 11 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern information** this sweater is a simple and fun project great for beginners and experienced crocheters alike it s made up of four basic pieces two rectangles for the front and back and two for the sleeves crocheted from the bottom up with a mix of stitches it creates relaxed stripes that are easy to follow using a 4 mm hook it works up quickly and keeps a nice lightweight feel the pattern comes with a helpful photo guide so even if you re a newbie crocheter you ll be able to follow along with ease whether you re after a cozy evening project or a comfy handmade addition to your wardrobe this sweater is a lovely laid-back option **find the
